segments.text: Hey Jackie . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing much . I'm just relaxing today . Why ? What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking about heading to the mall . Do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Both Bon and Nordstrom's is having there annual sale . It's a great time to buy some clothes you've been holding out on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . Where should we meet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll meet you in front of Nordstrom's in 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think about these shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're cute . But do you think you'll wear them much ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This sweater is so pretty . I love the low neck design .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on sale for $ 80 . What do you think ? Should I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For 80 bucks it looks great . Go try it on .
segments.speaker: S1
